name: password-generator
title: Password Generator
description: Generates a password from 5–64 characters with options for case, special characters, and more
author: joshuaiz

preferences.name: hideAfterCopy
preferences.description: Hide the raycast panel after the password is copied to the clipboard.
preferences.title: Options
preferences.label: Hide Raycast after copy

commands.name: generate-random-password
commands.title: Generate Random Password
commands.description: Generates a password from 5–64 characters in length with options for case, numbers, special characters, and more.

preferences.name: storePasswordLength
preferences.description: Remember the last password length between runs.
preferences.label: Remember password length

preferences.name: rememberNumbersAndCharacters
preferences.description: Remember to use numbers and characters between runs.
preferences.label: Remember numbers and characters

commands.name: generate-memorable-password
commands.title: Generate Memorable Password
commands.description: Generates a password with a specified format, with options for words, special characters, and random characters and numbers.

preferences.name: rememberCustomFormat
preferences.description: Remember the last custom format between runs.
preferences.label: Remember custom format

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
